DOC.brief_summary: This prospective , randomize , double-blind , parallel group trial ass efficacy safety intravenous dextrose 5 % solution compare normal saline ( standard care ) wash back procedure haemodialysis patient end stage renal failure ( ESRF ) respect systolic blood pressure control 3 month period . The primary objective establish efficacy 5 % dextrose solution compare normal saline ( 0.9 % sodium chloride solution ) respect systolic blood pressure control subject end stage renal failure ( ESRF ) regular hemodialysis . Secondary objective include monitor change body weight , thirst level body fluid volume .
